thread.title: Exclusive: Pole was China Open champion in 2011
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Pole was China Open champion in 2011

title: Exclusive: Pole was China Open champion in 2011
text:
Exclusive: Pole was China Open champion in 2011 
  
With Serena Williams, Maria Sharapova and Simona Halep all out of the tournament -- Agnieszka Radwanska could be the favourite to come away with the title. And the 2011 champ sat down with our Wang Dong to discuss playing in Beijing and everything tennis. Related Videos
